panels.visual: Val examining his sled Pulling out courier chalk
panels.dialogue: Val (thought): "If I can add a few runes of my own..."
panels.location: Sled race starting area, focused on Val's sled.

panels.visual: Close on Val's claws drawing runes on sled Magical symbols glowing
panels.dialogue: Val (thought): "Just like the tunnel marks... quick as wind..."

panels.visual: Malrik shaking hands with a gambler Prismor standing nearby
panels.dialogue: Gambler: "Five gold says my rider wins!" Malrik: "You have a deal, friend."
panels.location: Sled race starting area, near spectator zone.

panels.dialogue: Malrik: "If you, ah, don't race your absolute fastest... I'll split the winnings." Prismor: "That seems... unsporting." Malrik: "Consider it an investigation fee."
panels.location: Sled race starting area, slightly away from crowd.
